about_the_game:
Eternal Vanquisher Supporter Pack


The Imperial Era. A time when man is on the decline under a ruthless emperor that has embraced undeath. Nature itself has begun to die and the relentless undead empire is knocking on your door. This pack includes Reaper’s Call Portal, Death Toll back piece, and the Imperial YiQi collector’s pet.


Reapers Call

One of death’s comforts used to be its finality. While the Emperor has temporarily taken this comfort for countless souls, the Reaper eventually harvests his grim crop and provides his weary cultivator some respite.


Death Toll

You carry with you the weight of the inevitable. As you wade through the legions of the undead empire, Death’s bell tolls - heralding your onslaught.


Imperial YiQi

The Imperial YiQi is part of Last Epoch’s newest collectible pet series. The YiQi is a fiercely loyal pet who has taken a particular liking to you Traveler, following you not only across Eterra, but on your journey through time as well. Choose your favorite era’s YiQi, or start your quest to collect them all.


150 Bonus Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.

*Please note that DLC Packages are not refundable, and if you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Please check before purchasing to ensure you have not already purchased this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
